stanza.line: Since brass nor stone nor earth nor boundless seasea
But sad mortality oersways their powerpower
How with this rage shall beauty hold a pleaplea
Whose action is no stronger than a flowerflower
O how shall summer honey breath hold outout
Against the wrackful siege of battring daysdays
When rocks impregnable are not so stoutstout
Nor gates of steel so strong but time decaysdecays
Shall Time best jewel from Time chest lie hidhid
Or what strong hand can hold his swift foot backback
Or who his spoil of beauty can forbidforbid
O none unless this miracle have mightmight
That in black ink my love may still shine brightbright
